name: The Warriorlock (itch)
description:
There's only one way in, and one way out. Can you survive Carrion Road? 

Escape into a far-out fantasy adventure as a young and talented warriorlock, whose next mission will bring him to battle his own demons in this stellar, story-driven romp with heroic and hopelessly flawed characters steeped in a twisted tale of mind over madness. 

The Warriorlock™ is a story-driven dramedy adventure RPG that will take you on an escapism fantasy quest–beyond the mind's eye of a young man trapped in crisis–into the wilds of a dangerous and enchanted realm, where empowered with might, magic and perhaps a few good companions, he may find the strength and courage to battle the darkness within.  

Featuring a glorious synthesis of core RPG mechanics, and a visual story presentation teeming with memorable characters, mystery, magic, monsters, merriment and mayhem, this is one tall tale that just must be told.

Key Features
  • Picturebook presentation with a rich text narrative and entertaining character dialogue.
  • Detailed journey path comprised of meticulously-crafted scene art parallaxes and assets.
  • Optional party members, with up to four characters in party.
  • Visible encounter shadows that 'cloak' enemy type and weight until physically contacted.
  • Dynamic turn-based combat system with stat-driven turn-order, turn wait gauge, action point-locked talents, bribe option and victory item drops.
  • Sophisticated chance spawning system that randomizes item discovery and chest loot.
  • Convenient 'save anywhere' option, with player restored to exact save location.
  • Created, written and developed by one person.

Control notes:

  • Partial controller support (keyboard is required for some functions).
  • Keyboard control supports arrow keys and/or classic WASD navigation.
  • Default game pad controls are set to standard xbox controller scheme.
  • If using a game pad, please ensure the controller is connected before launching the game.
  • Toggle run option locks/unlocks the player sprite in the sprint position.
  • Native 1024 x 576 game window can be stretched to full screen (reduces clarity).
  • Saving and exiting the game is easily accomplished via options in the main menu.
  • Auto-save is set to save slot 1, and will save with each map transfer. For a more challenging difficulty level, use slots 2-4 to save manually when desired.
Support

A free basic guide for The Warriorlock™ is included in the game's inventory Item menu. 

Development

The Warriorlock™ is a lone creator's labor of love, which has greatly benefited from the support of many people throughout the magical course of development, and by those of you who are here now to play and participate. Thank you everyone for taking part in this journey. Be kind. Be strong. Be real. And may you always adventure hard.
